name: frog game
description:
All that's left of a stupid little game I had on the back burner since January 2018. Development progressed significantly further than this, but the files were lost when my hard drive got corrupted completely. I am currently working on a spiritual successor, for whatever that's worth.

Use the left / right keys to move

In the lost version of this game, there were some coins between the shop and the drug dealer. You could use them on either. The shop keeper would swindle you and fly away with your money, while the drug dealer would make your move speed faster. There were a number of gags as you walked to the right. One especially dumb one was a screen were a stock image of a guy danced to an 8bit version of Cotton Eye Joe.

All those funny hilarious ideas are lost...

Like tears in rain
